remarks: A standard textbook definition of a topological space.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Jul-2006.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
istps3OLD $p |- ( <. A , J >. e. TopSpOLD <-> ( ( J C_ ~P A /\ (/) e. J /\ A e. J ) /\ ( A. x ( x C_ J -> U. x e. J ) /\ A. x e. J A. y e. J ( x i^i y ) e. J ) ) ) $.
